name: dfs.datanode.directoryscan.interval
description:
Interval in seconds for Datanode to scan data directories and
  reconcile the difference between blocks in memory and on the disk.
  Support multiple time unit suffix(case insensitive), as described
  in dfs.heartbeat.interval.If no time unit is specified then seconds
  is assumed.

name: tfile.fs.input.buffer.size
description: Buffer size used for FSDataInputStream in bytes.

name: mapreduce.task.io.sort.factor
description:
The number of streams to merge at once while sorting
  files.  This determines the number of open file handles.

name: ipc.[port_number].scheduler.priority.levels
description:
How many priority levels to use within the scheduler and call
    queue. This property applies to RpcScheduler and CallQueue.

name: dfs.namenode.reconstruction.pending.timeout-sec
description:
Timeout in seconds for block reconstruction.  If this value is 0 or less,
    then it will default to 5 minutes.
